Title: AN ACT TO APPROPRIATE THE SUM OF EIGHTY THOUSAND PESOS FOR THE CONSTRUCTION OF TRADE AND HIGH SCHOOL BUILDINGS IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF BATANGAS, PROVINCE OF BATANGAS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.
Data:
[ Act No. 3440, November 28, 1928 ]
AN ACT TO APPROPRIATE THE SUM OF EIGHTY THOUSAND PESOS FOR THE CONSTRUCTION OF TRADE AND HIGH SCHOOL BUILDINGS IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF BATANGAS, PROVINCE OF BATANGAS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. The sum of eighty thousand pesos is hereby appropriated, out of any funds in the Insular Treasury not otherwise appropriated, to be used for the construction of trade and high school buildings in the municipality of Batangas, Province of Batangas.1a—àphi1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its approval.
Approved, November 28, 1928.
